song.verse: Buddy you’re a boy make a big noise Playin’ in the street gonna be a big man some day You got mud on yo’ face You big disgrace Kickin’ your can all over the place
song.chorus: We will we will rock you We will we will rock you
song.verse: Buddy you’re a young man hard man Shoutin’ in the street gonna take on the world some day You got blood on yo’ face You big disgrace Wavin’ your banner all over the place
song.chorus: We will we will rock you We will we will rock you
song.verse: Buddy you’re an old man poor man Pleadin’ with your eyes gonna make you some peace some day You got mud on your face You big disgrace Somebody better put you back into your place
song.chorus: We will we will rock you We will we will rock you
